mapper.select: SELECT m.mo_name, r.mem_id ,r.rev_no, r.rev_content, r.rev_rating, r.rev_createdAt FROM Review r JOIN Movie m ON r.mo_no = m.mo_no WHERE r.mem_id = '${mem_id}';
SELECT * FROM review where mo_no = ${mo_no} and rev_status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (rev_content, rev_rating, rev_status, mo_no, mem_id) VALUES (#{rev_content}, #{rev_rating}, 1, #{mo_no}, #{mem_id})
